thread.title: Cowboys Receiver Dez Bryant Unveils 'New Best Friend'
thread.title_full: Cowboys Receiver Dez Bryant Unveils 'New Best Friend'

author: Louis Milman
title: Cowboys Receiver Dez Bryant Unveils 'New Best Friend'
text:
Share Article 
Photo by Tom Pennington/Getty Images (DALLAS) -- Dallas Cowboys wide receiver Dez Bryant has made a new friend while sitting out with a foot injury. 
In a post to his Instagram page on Wednesday, Bryant posted a photo of himself with his "new best friend.... Dallas Bryant." Dallas, though, is a baby monkey.Bryant is rumored to be getting closer to a return to the field after suffering a Jones fracture in his foot.
